title: Hello Programming 2021: An Hour of Code with MCL-ACM
description:
December 11, 2021 - MCL-ACM held an Hour of Code™ event in participation to the international initiative during the Computer Science Education Week 2021. It was entitled ‘Hello Programming 2021: An Hour of Code with MCL-ACM’. The purpose of the event was to introduce computer science to students and to demystify coding.

In the event, programming was introduced to the students, then, there was a demonstration of programming using Scratch. After that, the participants had a simple activity wherein they created their own Cookie Clicker in Scratch. The participants were Grade 9 to 12 students from 18 schools nationwide. The event was held via Zoom but was also live on MCL-ACM’s Facebook page.
summary: MCL-ACM held an Hour of Code™ event in participation to the international initiative during the Computer Science Education Week 2021.
